long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filter what you see to 8-bit!

filter8 is a fun and nostalgic Chrome extension that transforms your web browsing experience into a delightful 8-bit-themed adventure. It brings a pixelated twist to your favorite websites, turning modern web content into a retro, pixel-art wonderland

With filter8, you can relive the magic of the 8-bit era while surfing the internet. Whether you're a gaming enthusiast, a fan of pixel art, or simply looking for a unique browsing experience, this extension will surely add nostalgia to your online activities.
